User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: TB 3.1.9 Heb 

when I tray to attach files as signature in the account settings, I succeed to attach HTML files with no problem but I fail to attach JGEG files to the message. with trail and error I discovered that the problem nay be due to the existence of Heb folder names in the file path, this happens with HTML files containing pic's but there is no problems whit HTML files with no pic's     

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.choosing a pic file as signature
2.placing it in a designated folder
3.opening TB's account manager
4.ticking ' add signature from file' and browsing to the above folder
5.choosing the JPEG file as signature and approving
6.when opening the 'create a new message', the windows opens with an empty frame in the place of the signature     

Actual Results:  
N\A

Expected Results:  
solving the problem

when I placed the JPEG file in a folder that the hole file path contain ENG folder names, the problem was solved. 
It seems to me that the TB sees Heb folder names as gibberish when trying to attach pic files
